titleStmt.title: Private musicke. Or the First booke of ayres and dialogues contayning songs of 4. 5. and 6. parts, of seuerall sorts, and being verse and chorus, is fit for voyces and viols. And for want of viols, they may be performed to either the virginall or lute, where the proficient can play vpon the ground, or for a shift to the base viol alone. All made and composed according to the rules of art. By M.P. Batchelar of Musicke.
titleStmt.author: Peerson, Martin, 1571?-1651.

All made and composed according to the rules of art. By M.P. Batchelar of Musicke.

notesStmt.note: imperfect; G4 torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
